name: AVFragmentedAssetMinder
desc: An object that periodically checks whether the system adds new fragments to a fragmented asset.

items.name: init(asset: AVAsset & AVFragmentMinding, mindingInterval: TimeInterval)
items.desc: Creates a fragmented asset minder that monitors the specified asset at the indicated minding interval.

items.name: var mindingInterval: TimeInterval
items.desc: An interval that specifies when to perform a check for additional fragments.

items.name: var assets: [AVAsset & AVFragmentMinding]
items.desc: The minded array of fragmented assets.

items.name: func addFragmentedAsset(AVAsset & AVFragmentMinding)
items.desc: Adds a fragmented asset to the array of minded assets.

items.name: func removeFragmentedAsset(AVAsset & AVFragmentMinding)
items.desc: Removes a fragmented asset from the array of minded assets.
